llm_command:

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-adservice-productcatalog
  namespace: currencyservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress

  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:

    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalogservice
EOF
